name: Endless Date
description:
An Endless Date is a narrative focused game picturing a college kid's date. 

**web version has minor format issue, download Mac/Windows version for a better experience

//controls: 

//         WASD/arrow keys to move player first person perspective camera

//          space to continue conversation

//          click on choices to choose the option

//          click on phone icon to open your phone and look on phone chat when you see the phone icon on the botton left

//          click on flowers in the scene when they are close up to ask May about the flowers

//press ESC during the game to change camera invert setting and restart/save/quit game

//Credit: use inky language to write dialogues

//        free assets from unity asset store

//        dialogue box sprite from Persona 4/5

//        audio from freesound

//        dog/cat pics download off internet
